metadata.dcterms:title: Data Dictionary for provided code of bias mitigation approaches for less-studied demographic groups of language learning technology
metadata.dcterms:description: The Data Dictionary provides information about the data set that was used to carry out the following code: XXX. In this study, the aim was to compare different bias mitigation approaches for less-studied demographic groups in language learning technologie.
metadata.dcterms:creator: Nathalie Rzepka
metadata.dcterms:subject: Algorithmic Bias
